text: The 1980 Atlantic hurricane season officially began on June 1, 1980, and ended on November 30, 1980. This season had about average activity with 15 storms, of which 11 got named. This season featured the very powerful Hurricane Allen. ==Storms== *Tropical Depression One *Hurricane Allen *Hurricane Bonnie *Tropical Depression Four *Hurricane Charley *Tropical Depression Six *Tropical Storm Danielle *Hurricane Earl *Hurricane Frances *Hurricane Georges *Tropical Storm Hermine *Hurricane Ivan *Hurricane Jeanne *Tropical Depression Fourteen *Hurricane Karl ==Unused names== * * * * * * * * * * ==Retirement== In the spring of 1981 the name "Allen" was retired and replaced by Andrew in 1986. ==Other websites== * Monthly Weather Review 1980 Atlantic hurricane season Category:1980s in weather
title: 1980 Atlantic hurricane season
